easy.q: I have hands but no arms, I can tell a story without words, and I keep time without shoes. What am I?

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?

hard.q: A path has two doors and two guards. One guard always tells the truth, the other always lies. you may ask one yes/no question to determine the safe door. What question do you ask?
hard.a: Ask either guard: 'If I asked the other guard which door leads outside, what would they say?', then choose the opposite door.
hard.hint: Use double questioning to reveal the truth regardless of who you ask.
